2. Strengthening relationships with suppliers: Building strong relationships with suppliers can ensure priority treatment in case of disruptions. This may enable Kintetsu Corporation to receive preferential treatment during shortages, enabling them to maintain production levels.

4. Implementing a risk management plan: A risk management plan can help companies plan for potential disruptions by anticipating and mitigating risks in advance. Kintetsu Corporation may employ a dedicated team to monitor risks and take proactive steps to address them.
